shapecode_3_y=0.500
shapecode_3_rad=0.10000
shapecode_3_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_zoom=1.00000

shapecode_3_g=0.000
shapecode_3_b=0.000
shapecode_3_a=1.000

shapecode_3_g2=1.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=dx=0;
per_frame_2=aba=aba+bass*0.1;
per_frame_3=switch=(switch-above(bass,1))%2;
per_frame_4=monitor=switch;
per_frame_5=//dx=sin(aba)*0.02+dx;
per_frame_6=//dy=cos(aba*0.2)*0.02+dy;
per_frame_7=//zoom=zoom+0.07*switch;
per_frame_8=//rot=zoom*switch*dx*dy*200;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`float2 olduv=uv;
warp_4=`uv=uv_orig;
warp_5=`ret=GetPixel(uv);
warp_6=`float s=4;
warp_7=`    float3 dx =(GetBlur1(uv + float2(0,texsize.z*s)) - GetBlur1(uv-float2(0,texsize.z*s)));
warp_8=`    float3 dy =(GetBlur1(uv + float2(texsize.w*s,0)) - GetBlur1(uv-float2(texsize.w*s,0)));
warp_9=`ret*=(1/(1+dx*dy));
warp_10=`ret*=0.99-abs(dx+dy)*0.5;
warp_11=`ret=lerp(ret,GetPixel(olduv),rad+0.1);
warp_12=`ret=ret*1.01+0.002;
warp_13=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`ret=GetBlur1(uv);
comp_4=`ret+=GetBlur1(float2(uv.x+ret.x,uv.y+ret.y));
comp_5=`ret+=GetBlur1(float2(uv.x-ret.y,uv.y-ret.y));
comp_6=`ret=pow(ret*0.6,8);
comp_7=`//ret*=ret.z;
comp_8=`ret+=pow(GetPixel(uv),ret);
comp_9=`ret-=1;
comp_10=`//ret=GetPixel(uv);
comp_11=`}
